attributes.title: Location Services being tracked
attributes.review: When downloading an app from this president i fully expected all of my personal top secret information to be kept safe from 3rd party Chinese companies only to find out that this app runs in your background and tracks your location even when you aren’t using it. not cool!!!!

attributes.title: made me mad 😡😡
attributes.review: i like oranges as a fruit but not as my president 🥶 i climbed 🧗‍♀️ out of my head 😐 and watched 👓 myself implode 🌋 a thought 💭 without a body 🦵outta be the shot 🩸 to take the load off my brain 🧠 is poison ☠️ and i’m searching for the antidote 💗 but every time i find it 🗺 my defenses scream oh no you don’t 🙅‍♀️ wOaH 😨 but in general this app was a let down 😠 didn’t even have cute shoes!

attributes.title: ABSULUTLY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i tried downloading this app and when ever i said the words sit, lie down, or roll over, all the men who i encountered go CRAZY. it’s like something.... zapped them. anyway i took advantage of it and now they do whatever i say. but it gets worse. some girl figured it out and now she is mad at me for making her brother do my laundry. thanks a lot trump app, now someone is mad at me.

attributes.title: So many issues!
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded! First, it played a weird noise the second I opened up the app that killed all my pets! I am so shocked and betrayed right now. And it won’t stop glitching and stealing all my information. I don’t know what to do anymore. This app is way too problematic and should be taken off the app store immediately!

attributes.title: Terrible do not download
attributes.review: This app stole all of my personal information and hacked into my phone! It sends me daily recruitment information to join a cult that requires everyone to be a morbidly obese racist. Not to mention it made it so every 19 seconds an alarm goes off in my phone to the sound of Amish Paradise. Great song but gets old when played that often.

attributes.title: Horrific
attributes.review: This app is completely Terrifying! When I downloaded it my phone let out a huge ringing sound! The next thing I know is everyone in my neighborhood came out of their house chanting, “All hail Karen Trump,” this went on for an hour. Once I figured out why it was happening I deleted the app. Everyone had no memory of what had happened except me! Soooo WHAT THE HELL!!!!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app to try to keep up with our presidential campaign, and I am having not only a hard time figuring out how to use it but it’s for some reason making my phone glitch like no tomorrow. So bad I had to delete this app! This is horrible, I would love to speak to whoever made this app and give them a piece of my mind.

attributes.title: Dear Donald trump 🥰🥰
attributes.review: You are a miserable old man with a trash 🗑 app I’m disgusted by this app and what u have done to my culture and yes I’m Hispanic and I will never forget how you have ruined so many family’s cause of your border  so get your old ugly self out of my life cause I don’t wanna hear your name cause it makes my ears bleed and I would rather go death so I can’t hear your name so pls DONT VOTE FOR DONAL TRUMPET for president again BESITOS 🥰

attributes.title: Worst App ever! 🤢
attributes.review: Honestly when I downloaded this app my phone started shutting down and freezing, not only that, because I’m Mexican It started calling me racial slurs and saying that imma take everyone’s job (which I would gladly do cause I need more money) but anyways, don’t download this app, is full of racist and ignorant people who see masks (when there’s a pandemic) as a threat 😪

attributes.title: TRUMP IS STINKY 🤭✨🐛
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a recently free Amish . Wanting to start a new life with the president who loves classic Americans like us Amish!! Once I downloaded it, my phone was immediately filled with child porn with Trump! I was in shock, I was in tears honey. After I finally got rid of the porn my phone was corrupted with literal ANIMAL PORN, once again with trump as a star. this time my daughter saw it, she died seconds later.
